sentences.english: Short-lived Sui Dynasty, Tang Dynasty, will soon be replaced.

sentences.english: After the downfall of the Tang Dynasty, China entered a chaotic period of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms.

sentences.english: At the same time, another tragicomedy is played in the Imperial Palace of Tand Dynasty.

It is a great political event in initial stage of the Tang Dynasty to abolish and set up the queen.

sentences.english: Nanzhao itself collapsed from internecine warfare shortly after the Tang Dynasty fell.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝灭亡不久，南昭国因内乱也开始崩溃瓦解。

sentences.english: This paper is based on historical material of the Tang dynasty and tries to clarify the question.

sentences.english: This chapter also describes the integration of the situation of Baekje drifting people in the Tang Dynasty and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 本章还阐述了百济遗民在唐朝和日本的融合状况。

sentences.english: After reunifying the Western Uegions, the Tang Dynasty instituted the local administrative system.

definition: An-Shi Rebellion (755-763) of 安祿山|安禄山[An1 Lu4 shan1] and 史思明[Shi3 Si1 ming2], a catastrophic setback for Tang dynasty
